GovernanceSettings.title: Styringsinnstillinger
GovernanceSettings.ticketBoostDescription: Hver loddtype har en unik kraft-boost effekt. N√•r koblet til en Politikoz, forbedrer det deres stemmemuligheter og √∏ker sjansene for √• vinne valg.
GovernanceSettings.votingPowerDescription: Din stemmekraft er basert p√• mengden KOZ-tokens du har. I fremtidige oppdateringer vil denne kraften brukes til √• stemme p√• endringer i styringsinnstillingene.
GovernanceSettings.potShareDescription: Denne innstillingen definerer andelen av valgpotten som vil bli distribuert i hver valgrunde.
GovernanceSettings.electionPotDescription: Denne seksjonen definerer hvordan Valgpotten distribueres mellom de valgte posisjonene og loddrollene. Hver kategori mottar en prosentandel av totalpotten, som tilsvarer en spesifikk ADA-verdi per valg.
GovernanceSettings.ticketLimitsDescription: Disse grensene definerer minimum og maksimum ADA-omr√•de som balanseringsmotoren kan jobbe innenfor for √• bestemme hvor mye innsats som trengs for √• tjene 1 lodd av hver type. Basert p√• innsatsforhold velger motoren en verdi innenfor dette omr√•det. For eksempel, hvis motoren velger 2000 ADA for Corrupt, f√•r en delegator med 5000 ADA 2 Corrupt-lodd. Gjenv√¶rende innsats g√•r til neste type: Lobbyist ‚Üí Briber ‚Üí Launderer, og fortsetter til ingen flere lodd kan tildeles.
GovernanceSettings.ticketLimitsCurrent: N√•v√¶rende verdi valgt av motoren: {amount} ADA
GovernanceSettings.intervalDescription: Definerer intervallet som trengs for neste valg. Hvis satt til 1, vil et valg skje hver epoke.
GovernanceSettings.luckDescription: Bestemmer antall sifre en bruker m√• velge som lykketallet tildelt hver Politikoz.
GovernanceSettings.jailDescription: Definerer prosentvis sjanse for at en Politikoz blir sendt til fengsel etter √• ha blitt valgt.
GovernanceSettings.bailDescription: Definerer kostnaden (i KOZ) som m√• betales per d√∏mt epoke for √• forlate fengselet f√∏r den tilfeldige straffetiden ender.
GovernanceSettings.bestDayDescription: Definerer foretrukket ukedag for √• starte en ny valgsyklus.
GovernanceSettings.waveSettingsDescription: Hver b√∏lge representerer et stadium i valgprosessen med spesifikke regler som tallpresisjon, bonuser, utholdenhetsrequirer, og tidsintervaller f√∏r utf√∏relse.
GovernanceSettings.politikozDescription: Definerer hvor mange Politikoz av hver rolle som vil bli valgt i hvert valg og beregner ADA-andelen per valgt rolle basert p√• distribusjonsinnstillingene.
GovernanceSettings.ticketDescription: Definerer antall loddbaserte roller som vil bli valgt i hvert valg og beregner ADA-andelen per valgt lodd basert p√• distribusjonsinnstillingene.

Team.title: Meet the Team
Team.description: Our passionate and focused team may be small, but we are deeply rooted in the Cardano Blockchain ecosystem. As ADA investors since 2019 and founders of the Politikoz NFT project in 2021, our vision goes far beyond NFTs ‚Äî we aim to deliver long-term value to our community.
Team.uxuiDesc: Pixel Art Design, UI/UX, User Testing.
Team.fullstackDesc: Backend (Java), Frontend (Next.js), PostgreSQL Database, AWS Developer.
Team.infraDesc: Server Management, Stake Pool Operator, Infrastructure, System Testing.

TicketPolicy.calculatorDescription: Enter your staking amount to simulate how many tickets you would receive per tier and see your bonus reward in KOZ.

TicketPolicy.exampleIntro: Suppose a delegator has 12,000 ADA staked:
TicketPolicy.exampleLine2: Remaining: 2,000 ADA ‚Üí Not enough for 1 Lobbyist (requires 3,000 ADA)
TicketPolicy.exampleLine3: Move to next tier: 2 Briber tickets (2 √ó 1000)
TicketPolicy.exampleLine4: Remaining: 0 ADA ‚Üí No Launderer ticket awarded
TicketPolicy.exampleNote: The system always follows the order: Corrupt ‚Üí Lobbyist ‚Üí Briber ‚Üí Launderer and rolls down remaining ADA.
TicketPolicy.policyExplanation: This policy defines how much ADA is needed to earn one ticket of each type. The distribution engine works in a tiered order starting from
TicketPolicy.policyRollover: When a delegator‚Äôs stake is not enough for the current tier, the remaining ADA is carried over to the next one.

Tokenomics.title: Meet $KOZ
Tokenomics.subtitle: A Utility Coin for Politikoz.io
Tokenomics.overview: The world of Koz will have a utility token with the sole purpose of boosting its internal economy, allowing the purchase of items such as political parties and party coalitions, bets for or against a Politikoz, and similar functions to be announced in due course.
Tokenomics.description: $KOZ is the utility token of the Politikoz.io ecosystem, created to drive the internal dynamics of the platform. It serves as a functional asset for engaging with governance systems, accessing exclusive features, and participating in in-game mechanisms, with its utility continuously evolving as new features are introduced.

notes.socialClaims: For future airdrop campaigns via X (Twitter), Discord, etc.
notes.liquidity: For DEX pairs and liquidity support

Treasury.overviewDescription: The Treasury is the core fund of the Politikoz project, used to reward election winners and support ecosystem initiatives. It is primarily accumulated through the rewards generated by our PLKOZ Stake Pool (Fixed Cost + Margin), which are 100% donated to the community. Additional income sources will be integrated into the platform in the future.

Audit.howItWorks: How Do We Ensure Fair Elections?
Audit.merkleExplanation: It's our magic tree! üå≥ Think of our Merkle tree as a digital fingerprint of all valid tickets in the election. Once the election starts, this fingerprint is recorded on the blockchain. While technically new tickets could be added after the start, they won't be part of the tree's fingerprint. This means any ticket added after the election begins will fail verification and be considered invalid, ensuring election integrity. üîí‚ú®
Audit.sourceMention: We use the Merkle tree code created by
Audit.validateTicket: Check If the Ticket Number Was In The Box
Audit.validTicket: ‚úÖ Yes! This number was definitely in the box before the draw started!
Audit.invalidTicket: ‚ùå Sorry, this number wasn't in the box when we started the draw
Audit.transactionLabel: Merkle root stored in transaction before the election started
